summary: RECEIVED RECALL 02V278000 CONCERNING ABS FAILURE.  WHILE DRIVING AT 30 MPH, THE CONSUMER SAW SMOKE COMING OUT FROM THE FRONT WHEELS.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER AND THE DEALER LEARNED THAT A RECALL WAS IN EFFECT.  THE DEALER PRESENTED A SET OF TEMPORARY PARTS TO FIX THE PROBLEM.  THE CONSUMER WAITED FOR EIGHT MONTHS FOR THE REQUIRED PARTS TO ARRIVE THEN THE DEALER PRESENTED A SET OF TEMPORARY PARTS TO FIX THE PROBLEM.   *AK   *SCC   *JB

WHILE APPLYING THE BRAKES  ON A MOTOR HOME AND WITHOUT WARNING BRAKE LIGHT APPEARED ON THE DASHBOARD.  ALSO, THERE SMOKE WAS COMING FROM THE LEFT FRONT WHEEL, AND OIL  LEAKED FROM IN SIDE OF WHEEL BEARING.    HEAT  KNOCKED OUT THE ABS BRAKING SYSTEM, CAUSING  THE PEDAL TO GO ALL THE WAY DOWN TO THE FLOOR. *AK  THE WHEEL BEARINGS WERE IN AN OIL BATH.  BOTH SIDES HAD THE OIL BOILING OUT THE CENTER HOLE.  THE LEFT FRONT ROTORS HAS BEEN SO HOT THAT IT CHANGED THE COLOR OF THE STEEL.  *NLM

VEHICLE LEFT TIRE BLEW OUT WHILE DRIVING.*MR  THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED TWO BLOW OUTS.  THE FIRST TIME THE DRIVERS SIDE FRONT TIRE BLEW OUT  WHILE DRIVING.  THE SECOND TIME THE PASSENGER SIDE FRONT TIRE BLEW OUT WHILE DRIVING.   THIS TIRE CAUSED DAMAGE TOT HE FUEL LINE WHICH CAUSED FUEL TO LEAK INTO THE HOT ROTORS.   ANOTHER VEHICLE WAS DAMAGED BY THE FLYING RUBBER.   THE TIRE WAS SENT TO THE CONSUMER INSURANCE COMPANY FOR AN INDEPENDENT EVALUATION.  *NLM

FROM DATE OF PURCHASE WE HAD CONCERNS ON HOW BRAKING SYSTEM WORKED. MANUFACTURER HAS TOLD US FOR 2 YEARS BRAKES ARE FINE. MOTOR HOME HAS BEEN IN SHOP FOR BRAKES, IT HAS HAD 4 SETS OF PADS, 2ND SET OF ROTORS, 2ND SET OF CALIBORS, IN LESS THAN 13,000 MILES. THE COACH HAS BEEN UNUSED SINCE APRIL 2001 AND IS NOW IN SHOP, DUE TO HEATING PROBLEMS OF BRAKES. WE HAVE HAD THE COACH AT OREGON LIGHT TRUCK REPAIR TALKING WITH THEM, THEY FEEL THIS COACH IS EXTREMLY UNDER BRAKED. MANUFACTURE HAS DISCONTUNED CONTACT OTHER THAN ATTORNEYS. WHILE DRIVING COACH BRAKES GET EXTREMLY HOT AND YOU CAN SMELL THEM. WHEN LOOKING AT FRONT BRAKES YOU CAN SEE THE SMOKE BECAUSE THEY ARE SO HOT. BRAKES GET TO SMOKING POINT IN ANY DRIVING CONDITION. MANUFACTURE STATES THAT WHEN BRAKES GET HOT THAT IT IS COMMON. WE AND THE REPAIR PEOPLE (THAT WE HAVE THE COACH AT NOW) DISAGREE WITH BEAVER. FRONT BRAKES WILL GET HOT ENOUGH TO DISCOLOR ALUMUNIM WHEELS. PLEASE CONTACT US WITH ANY FUTHER QUESTIONS. *AK
